Articles.Content: Seems like Astronomer's Visual Packs or KSPRC isn't updated for the 1.0.2 edition of KSP. Which means I lost those two gorgeous sun flare textures. I know there is a way to edit the Shardassets files and manually install the texture yourself, but I could never get it working. So... Does anyone have a fabulous looking sunflare they are willing to share with little ol me?
